contents: 1. fol. 1b-98a: al-Suyūf al-ḥidād fī aʻnāq ahl al-zandaqah wa-al-ilḥād.
2. fol. 100b-191b: Ghunyat arbāb al-samāʻ fī kashf al-qināʻ.
4. fol. 198b-237a: Qawānīn ḥikam al-ishrāq ilá kull al-Ṣūfīyah fī jamīʻ al-āfāq.
5. fol. 237b-287b: Nafaḥāt al-ṣafāʼ bi-al-sūl li-sharḥ Uṣūl muqaddimāt al-uṣūl.
8. fol. 325b-327b: Jalāʼ al-naẓar fī baqāʼ al-tanzīh maʻa al-tajallī fī al-ṣuwar.
9. fol. 327b-329a: Madd al-fayʼ fī taqrīr "laysa ka-mithlihi shayʾ."
11. fol. 332a-332b: Risālah fī tawḥīd al-afʻāl wa-taḥqīq maʻná al-kasb.
11. fol. 332b-343a: Kawkab al-ṣubḥ fī izālat layl al-qubḥ.
12. fol. 345b-409b: Khamrat al-ḥān wa-rannat al-alḥān fī sharḥ Risālat al-Shaykh Arslān.
13. fol. 411b-518a: Kitāb al-Wujūd al-ḥaqq wa-khiṭāb al-shuhūd al-ṣidq.
extent: 519 leaves : paper ; 234 x 175 mm. bound to 238 x 181 mm.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
